description.@en: You obtain power, but at what cost? The eyes of your Daemon are fixated on you, judging you – eager to reward, or to punish.

effect.@en: You immediately gain a Disorder. In addition, select one of the Hellfurnace’s Aspects and replace your Order Alignment with it. Instead of gaining Fate Points, you may opt to gain a Daemonic Gift. Aspects and Daemonic Gifts are found in Chapter 5: Liber Daemonum. When you generate face ‘6’ with Chaos Dice, you invoke a Chaos Manifestation. Furthermore, you must add 1 additional Chaos Die when Channeling Power. Finally, whenever you gain 1 permanent Chaos Rank, a Disorder or Malignancy, you also permanently suffer a -1 penalty to Movement. Should your Movement permanently reach zero, you are immediately Slain!, turned entirely to stone.
